title: 外国势力支持港独实锤了
contents:

钟镇涛儿子是美国人，公开支持港独

鍾嘉浚寫道：「HK people, you should not be called Chinese. Salty as F, disrespectful as F, racist as F. Almost as bad as cops in America. You should be honoring the millions of soldiers that died for you so you can be here. Without them, you'll be dead sperm flushed in a bathroom or wrapped in tissue.」（香港人，你们不應該叫做中國人。好X蠢、好X不尊重、好X種族歧視，像美國警察一样坏。你们應該表揚千萬位為你捨身的士兵。没有他们，你只是被沖入廁所或用紙巾包住的死精蟲。)
